name: Streamer Simulator Fitness Girl Kelly
description:
Become the best streamer on the platform in new game simulator. 

How to play?
You earn money with donations, get more viewers to get bigger donations!
Working out will give you more viewers but watch for your stamina level or Kelly will get tired. Eat food and drink to restore your stamina.  Buy new clothes in stream shop with your hard-earned money. 

Next update I will add stream merch, toys, furniture and new clothes to the game.
